description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the supply and delivery of one Parker Balston Model N2-80 Membrane N2 Nitrogen Generator, that meets or exceeds the specifications outlined in Annex – Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
####Bid Solicitation Number: WS4148264992

#####Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites Bidder to respond to this RFP for the supply and delivery of a Parker Balston Model N2-80 Membrane Nitrogen Generator.

####Specifications and Requirements
The subject tender is for the supply and delivery of a Parker Balston Model N2-80 Membrane Nitrogen Generator that meets or exceeds the specifications outlined in the Annex – Statement of Requirement.

#### Bid Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be made on November 10th, 2023, before 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST). Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

#### Contract Details
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Status
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Notice Type Description:** Demande de propositions
- **Publication Date:** October 12, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** November 10th, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date:** November 7th, 2023

#### Points of Contact
- **Point of Contact:** Liang, Xiaodong (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Information:** xiaodong.liang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information
- **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706253
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
- **Regions of Delivery:** All across Canada
- **End User Entities:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)

#### Contact Information
- **Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
  - **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  - **City:** Gatineau, Quebec
  - **Postal Code:** K1A 0S5
  - **Country:** Canada

- **Agence canadienne d’inspection des aliments (ACIA)**
  - **Address:** 1400 Merivale Road
  - **City:** Ottawa, Ontario
  - **Postal Code:** K1A 0
